description:
Learning 1-on-1 with an industry expert and mentor is proven to help students learn more, learn faster, and retain knowledge better. It’s the best way to learn, and we’re excited to now offer mentors on Udemy through our partnership with Codementor.

The Mentor Starter Package includes 45 minutes of prepaid mentor-time, which you can use in a single session, or break into 15-minute increments. After each purchase, you will be prompted to schedule your sessions at a time that is convenient. After you have used up all of your time, you are welcome to continue learning through Udemy, or purchase additional mentor-time.
title: 1-on-1 Web Development Mentoring
